title: Lipo Slim | Vitalogy Health and Integrative Medicine | United States
description: A mega dose of B12 plus metabolism boosting and fat burning amino acids (MIC). MIC helps remove fat and toxins from the liver. One of your liver's most important functions is to help metabolize fats, proteins and carbohydrates so any boost to your liver is a boost to your metabolism.
